schema.description: Generic, very unstructured bad row that can be emitted by any Snowplow component

timestamp.description: Timestamp at which the failure occurred

payload.description: The stringified event for which there is a bad row

processor.description: Information about the piece of software responsible for the creation of the bad row

artifact.description: Artifact responsible for the creation of the bad row

version.description: Version of the artifact responsible for the creation of the bad row
